The Counseling Center at West Caldwell

1120 Bloomfield Avenue, Suite 201 West Caldwell, NJ 07006-7131

The Counseling Center at West Caldwell provides compassionate, effective outpatient counseling for addiction and mental health. Our West Caldwell team offers flexible programs to fit your life.

Call Our 24/7 Help Center

Visit Our West Caldwell Facility

We are conveniently located to serve the West Caldwell community and beyond. Our team is ready to help you.

Ready to Take the First Step? Contact Us 24/7

Send Us a Confidential Message

By submitting, you authorize The Counseling Center to reach out via phone, email, or text. You may opt-out at any time. Message/data rates apply. Consent is not a condition of admission.

Need Help Now?

Have a question about insurance policies and costs? Our accommodating staff is glad to assist. We’ll gather your insurance details and get together with your insurer to get as much of your care paid for as possible.

The Counseling Center welcomes most commercial insurance policies. At present, we are unable to accept Medicaid. Please call for more information about Medicare policies.

Descriptions and reports on products or services mentioned on this website should not be considered endorsements nor recommendations. If you have a medical emergency, call 911 or a doctor immediately. If you have concerns about suicide, please call or text 988.
